lead_paragraph: Chief executive Tony Scholes has said that while Stoke City have survived fairly comfortably since earning promotion to the Premier League in 2008, they have never taken their top-flight status for granted.

headline.print_headline: Stoke Can Never Take Top-Flight Status for Granted-CEO
headline.main: Stoke Can Never Take Top-Flight Status for Granted-CEO

snippet: Chief executive Tony Scholes has said that while Stoke City have survived fairly comfortably since earning promotion to the Premier League in 2008, they have never taken their top-flight status for granted....
